mapper.sql: DDL_REL_ID, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, DDL_REL_PNM, DDL_REL_LNM, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID
mapper.insert: insert into WAM_DDL_REL (DDL_REL_ID, PA_ENTY_ID, PA_ATTR_ID, CH_ENTY_ID, CH_ATTR_ID, DDL_REL_PNM, DDL_REL_LNM, REL_TYP_CD, CRD_TYP_CD, PA_OPT_TYP_CD, PA_SUBJ_ID, CH_SUBJ_ID, RQST_NO, RQST_SNO, RQST_DTL_SNO, OBJ_DESCN, OBJ_VERS, REG_TYP_CD, FRS_RQST_DTM, FRS_RQST_USER_ID, RQST_DTM, RQST_USER_ID, APRV_DTM, APRV_USER_ID ) values (#{ddlRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddlRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

DDL_REL_ID,
PA_ENTY_ID,
PA_ATTR_ID,

OBJ_DESCN,
OBJ_VERS,
REG_TYP_CD,
FRS_RQST_DTM,
FRS_RQST_USER_ID,
RQST_DTM,
RQST_USER_ID,
APRV_DTM,
APRV_USER_ID,

mapper.update:
update WAM_DDL_REL
DDL_REL_PNM = #{ddlRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DDL_REL_LNM = #{ddlRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DDL_REL_ID = #{ddlRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAM_DDL_REL set DDL_REL_PNM = #{ddlRelPnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DDL_REL_LNM = #{ddlRelLnm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REL_TYP_CD = #{relTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CRD_TYP_CD = #{crdTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_OPT_TYP_CD = #{paOptTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_SUBJ_ID = #{paSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CH_SUBJ_ID = #{chSubjId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RQST_DTL_SNO = #{rqstDtlSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FRS_RQST_DTM = #{frsRqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQST_DTM = #{rqstDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APRV_DTM = #{aprvDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APRV_USER_ID = #{aprvUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DDL_REL_ID = #{ddlRelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ENTY_ID = #{paEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and PA_ATTR_ID = #{paAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ENTY_ID = #{chEntyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CH_ATTR_ID = #{chAttrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT A.* , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , PS.FULL_PATH AS PA_SUBJ_PNM , PE.DDL_TBL_PNM AS PA_ENTY_PNM , PA.DDL_COL_PNM AS PA_ATTR_PNM , CS.FULL_PATH AS CH_SUBJ_PNM , CE.DDL_TBL_PNM AS CH_ENTY_PNM , CA.DDL_COL_PNM AS CH_ATTR_PNM
FROM WAM_DDL_REL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ PS ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = PS.SUBJ_ID AND PS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ CS ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = CS.SUBJ_ID AND CS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL PE ON A.PA_ENTY_ID = PE.DDL_TBL_ID AND PE.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL CE ON A.CH_ENTY_ID = CE.DDL_TBL_ID AND CE.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL PA ON A.PA_ATTR_ID = PA.DDL_COL_ID AND PA.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL CA ON A.CH_ATTR_ID = CA.DDL_COL_ID AND CA.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND (A.PA_ENTY_ID = #{ddlTblId} OR A.CH_ENTY_ID = #{ddlTblId})

SELECT A.* , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , PS.FULL_PATH AS PA_SUBJ_PNM , PE.DDL_TBL_PNM AS PA_ENTY_PNM , PA.DDL_COL_PNM AS PA_ATTR_PNM , CS.FULL_PATH AS CH_SUBJ_PNM , CE.DDL_TBL_PNM AS CH_ENTY_PNM , CA.DDL_COL_PNM AS CH_ATTR_PNM , CASE WHEN A.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') THEN '#0000FF' ELSE NULL END AS FontColor FROM WAH_DDL_REL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ PS ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = PS.SUBJ_ID AND PS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ CS ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = CS.SUBJ_ID AND CS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL PE ON A.PA_ENTY_ID = PE.DDL_TBL_ID AND PE.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_TBL CE ON A.CH_ENTY_ID = CE.DDL_TBL_ID AND CE.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL PA ON A.PA_ATTR_ID = PA.DDL_COL_ID AND PA.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAM_DDL_COL CA ON A.CH_ATTR_ID = CA.DDL_COL_ID AND CA.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND (A.PA_ENTY_ID = #{ddlTblId} OR A.CH_ENTY_ID = #{ddlTblId}) ORDER BY A.EXP_DTM DESC, A.STR_DTM DESC

SELECT A.* , U.USER_NM AS FRS_RQST_USER_NM , U1.USER_NM AS RQST_USER_NM , U2.USER_NM AS APRV_USER_NM , PS.FULL_PATH AS PA_SUBJ_PNM , PE.DDL_TBL_PNM AS PA_ENTY_PNM , PA.DDL_COL_PNM AS PA_ATTR_PNM , CS.FULL_PATH AS CH_SUBJ_PNM , CE.DDL_TBL_PNM AS CH_ENTY_PNM , CA.DDL_COL_PNM AS CH_ATTR_PNM
FROM WAH_DDL_REL A LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ PS ON A.PA_SUBJ_ID = PS.SUBJ_ID AND PS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_SUBJ CS ON A.CH_SUBJ_ID = CS.SUBJ_ID AND CS.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND CS.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAH_DDL_TBL PE ON A.PA_ENTY_ID = PE.DDL_TBL_ID AND PE.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAH_DDL_TBL CE ON A.CH_ENTY_ID = CE.DDL_TBL_ID AND CE.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAH_DDL_COL PA ON A.PA_ATTR_ID = PA.DDL_COL_ID AND PA.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAH_DDL_COL CA ON A.CH_ATTR_ID = CA.DDL_COL_ID AND CA.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U ON A.FRS_RQST_USER_ID = U.USER_ID AND U.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U1 ON A.RQST_USER_ID = U1.USER_ID AND U1.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U1.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') LEFT OUTER JOIN WAA_USER U2 ON A.APRV_USER_ID = U2.USER_ID AND U2.EXP_DTM = TO_DATE('9999-12-31', 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND U2.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') WHERE A.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C', 'U') AND (A.PA_ENTY_ID = #{ddlTblId} OR A.CH_ENTY_ID = #{ddlTblId})
